name: seq2annotation
shortDescription: Based on TensorFlow's general sequence tagging algorithm library (currently including BiLSTM+CRF and IDCNN+CRF), it can achieve sequence tagging tasks such as Chinese word segmentation, part-of-speech tagging, and named entity recognition.
longDescription: Based on TensorFlow's general sequence tagging algorithm library (currently including BiLSTM+CRF and IDCNN+CRF), it can achieve sequence tagging tasks such as Chinese word segmentation, part-of-speech tagging, and named entity recognition.
